summary: This document is an invitation letter for the Lujiazui Forum 2010, which is set to take place in Shanghai, China. The letter extends an invitation to Lord Mandelson to speak at the event, highlighting the forum's significance in discussing global financial issues and reforms in the post-crisis era.

keyFacts: The Lujiazui Forum 2010 is set to occur on June 25th and 26th, 2010.
The forum aims to discuss major topics in the global financial industry and strengthen cross-border cooperation.
High-level government officials and leaders from financial institutions are expected to attend.
The invitation is extended to Lord Mandelson to deliver a keynote speech.
The forum symbolizes Shanghai's vision of becoming a leading international financial center.
